subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Tuner
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I prefer tuners from other digital radios, most car tuners are really noisy
in between stations, the only advantage is they can be used in a metal
enclosure. I use Arm Band tuners from various makers, whatever I can find at
the thrift store, and some Timex calock radios have a seperate tuner board.
I think it's model T309 series. The Radio Shack model Hultay is hacking
sounds really good.

 F-S
